meanings.definition: A safety belt or harness worn in a vehicle to secure a person in their seat.
meanings.sent1: The seatbelts in the car kept us safe during the bumpy ride.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to always fasten your seatbelts before the car starts moving.
meanings.sent3: I forgot to wear my seatbelts and ended up sliding off the seat!
meanings.sent4: Her seatbelts of determination kept her grounded in times of trouble.
meanings.sent5: The bright red seatbelts stood out against the dark interior of the car.

meanings.definition: A strap or belt used to secure a person in a seat or chair.
meanings.sent1: The toddler's seatbelts on the high chair prevented any accidents.
meanings.sent2: She adjusted the seatbelts on the swing to make sure they were tight.
meanings.sent3: The seatbelts on the office chair made it feel like a throne.
meanings.sent4: His seatbelts of responsibility kept him anchored to his commitments.
meanings.sent5: The old seatbelts on the antique chair were fraying at the edges.
